code: @Before public void setUp() throws Exception {     endpoint = new MllpEndpoint("mllp://dummy", new MllpComponent(), new MllpConfiguration()).     instance = new MllpSocketBuffer(endpoint). }

byte[] buildTestBytes(boolean includeStartOfBlock, boolean includeEndOfBlock, boolean includeEndOfData) throws IOException {     return buildTestBytes(TEST_HL7_MESSAGE, includeStartOfBlock, includeEndOfBlock, includeEndOfData). }

byte[] buildTestBytes(String message, boolean includeStartOfBlock, boolean includeEndOfBlock, boolean includeEndOfData) throws IOException {     ByteArrayOutputStream payloadBuilder = new ByteArrayOutputStream().     if (includeStartOfBlock) {         payloadBuilder.write(MllpProtocolConstants.START_OF_BLOCK).     }     if (message != null && !message.isEmpty()) {         payloadBuilder.write(message.getBytes()).     }     if (includeEndOfBlock) {         payloadBuilder.write(MllpProtocolConstants.END_OF_BLOCK).     }     if (includeEndOfData) {         payloadBuilder.write(MllpProtocolConstants.END_OF_DATA).     }     return payloadBuilder.toByteArray(). }
